name: Public education
text: [§328J‑13]  Public education.  The department shall engage in a public education program to explain and clarify the purposes and requirements of this chapter to the public, and to guide owners, operators, and managers in their compliance with it.  The program may include but is not limited to publication of a brochure for affected businesses and individuals explaining this chapter. [L 2006, c 295, pt of §2]
